Klaus Mueller.description: wrapping up the conversation and saying goodbye to Isabella at Hobbs Cafe. (conversing about Eddy Lin and Klaus Mueller are discussing ways to promote diversity and inclusion at their upcoming poetry reading event by incorporating elements of jazz music, African American literature, accessibility options for differently-abled individuals, collaborating with Black-owned businesses and artists, involving young aspiring poets from diverse backgrounds, organizing workshops on allyship and privilege, inviting performers from different cultural backgrounds, showcasing Black LGBTQ+ individuals, and addressing systemic inequalities and racism to create a more equitable space.) @ the Ville:artist's co-living space:common room:common room sofa
